name: Kafka Tool
semantic_context: Sends messages to a Kafka topic
natural_language_description: 这是 Kafka Tool 节点。主要用于: Sends messages to a Kafka topic

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Sends messages to a Kafka topic
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Sends messages to a Kafka topic | (必填项)

topic.name: topic
topic.description: Name of the queue of topic to publish to
topic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topic | 作用: Name of the queue of topic to publish to

sendInputData.name: sendInputData
sendInputData.description: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON to Kafka
sendInputData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Input Data | 作用: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON to Kafka | 默认值: True

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message to be sent

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

useSchemaRegistry.name: useSchemaRegistry
useSchemaRegistry.description: Whether to use Confluent Schema Registry
useSchemaRegistry.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Schema Registry | 作用: Whether to use Confluent Schema Registry | 默认值: False

schemaRegistryUrl.name: schemaRegistryUrl
schemaRegistryUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema Registry URL | 作用: URL of the schema registry | (必填项)

useKey.name: useKey
useKey.description: Whether to use a message key
useKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Key | 作用: Whether to use a message key | 默认值: False

key.name: key
key.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key | 作用: The message key | (必填项)

eventName.name: eventName
eventName.description: Namespace and Name of Schema in Schema Registry (namespace.name)
eventName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Name | 作用: Namespace and Name of Schema in Schema Registry (namespace.name) | (必填项)

headersUi.name: headersUi
headersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers | 默认值: {}

headerParametersJson.name: headerParametersJson
headerParametersJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers (JSON) | 作用: Header parameters as JSON (flat object)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: acks (值: None) - Whether or not producer must wait for acknowledgement from all replicas
compression (值: None) - Whether to send the data in a compressed format using the GZIP codec
timeout (值: None) - The time to await a response in ms
